name: spotbugs
description: SpotBugs是FindBugs的继任者，用于查找Java代码中的错误（需要编译）

checkrule_set.rule_title: 创建一个空的 jar 文件条目
checkrule_set.description: Creates an empty jar file entry

checkrule_set.rule_title: 创建一个空的 zip 文件条目
checkrule_set.description: Creates an empty zip file entry

checkrule_set.rule_title: 并发抽象的调用顺序可能不是原子的
checkrule_set.description: Sequence of calls to concurrent abstraction may not be atomic

checkrule_set.rule_title: 错误的 Applet 构造函数依赖于未初始化的 AppletStub
checkrule_set.description: Bad Applet Constructor relies on uninitialized AppletStub

checkrule_set.rule_title: 有疑问的 Collection 转换为抽象 Collection
checkrule_set.description: Questionable cast to abstract collection

checkrule_set.rule_title: 有疑问的 Collection 转换为具体 Collection
checkrule_set.description: Questionable cast to concrete collection

checkrule_set.rule_title: Equals 方法不应假设其参数类型
checkrule_set.description: Equals method should not assume anything about the type of its argument

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不可用的转换
checkrule_set.solution: 该类型转换可能产生异常请判断后转换
checkrule_set.description:
这个转换总是会抛出一个ClassCastException异常。
FindBugs跟踪instanceof检查的类型信息，
并且还使用关于类型的更精确的信息
从方法返回并从字段加载的值。
因此，它可能有更精确的信息
一个变量的声明类型，并可以用它来确定
演员将在运行时总是抛出异常。
参考官方文档

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不可能的向下转换
checkrule_set.description: Impossible downcast

checkrule_set.rule_title: toArray() 结果的可能性降低
checkrule_set.description: Impossible downcast of toArray() result

checkrule_set.rule_title: instanceof 将始终返回 false
checkrule_set.description: instanceof will always return false

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未经检查/未经确认的转换
checkrule_set.description: Unchecked/unconfirmed cast

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未经检查/未经确认的方法返回的返回值
checkrule_set.description: Unchecked/unconfirmed cast of return value from method

checkrule_set.rule_title: instanceof 将始终返回 true
checkrule_set.description: instanceof will always return true

checkrule_set.rule_title: 按位加有符号字节值
checkrule_set.description: Bitwise add of signed byte value

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不兼容的位掩码
checkrule_set.description: Incompatible bit masks
Check to see if ((…) & 0) == 0

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不兼容的位掩码
checkrule_set.description: Incompatible bit masks

checkrule_set.rule_title: 有符号字节值的按位或
checkrule_set.description: Bitwise OR of signed byte value

checkrule_set.rule_title: 检查按位操作的迹象
checkrule_set.description: Check for sign of bitwise operation

checkrule_set.rule_title: 检查涉及负数的按位运算的符号
checkrule_set.description: Check for sign of bitwise operation involving negative number

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类错误地重写了在超类适配器中实现的方法
checkrule_set.description: Class overrides a method implemented in super class Adapter wrongly

checkrule_set.rule_title: 变速操作可能解析错误
checkrule_set.description: Possible bad parsing of shift operation

checkrule_set.rule_title: 将原始值装箱，然后立即取消装箱
checkrule_set.description: Primitive value is boxed and then immediately unboxed

checkrule_set.rule_title: 将原始值装箱，然后取消装箱以执行原始强制
checkrule_set.description: Primitive value is boxed then unboxed to perform primitive coercion

checkrule_set.rule_title: 三元运算符将原始值拆箱并强制
checkrule_set.description: Primitive value is unboxed and coerced for ternary operator

checkrule_set.rule_title: 装箱的值被取消装箱，然后立即重新装箱
checkrule_set.description: Boxed value is unboxed and then immediately reboxed

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可能不兼容的元素存储在协变数组中
checkrule_set.description: Possibly incompatible element is stored in covariant array

checkrule_set.rule_title: 字段的协变数组分配
checkrule_set.description: Covariant array assignment to a field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 协变量数组分配给局部变量
checkrule_set.description: Covariant array assignment to a local variable

checkrule_set.rule_title: 从方法返回协变数组
checkrule_set.description: Covariant array is returned from the method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 测试类之间的循环依赖
checkrule_set.description: Test for circular dependencies among classes

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类是最终的，但声明受保护的字段
checkrule_set.description: Class is final but declares protected field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 找到已知常数的粗略值
checkrule_set.description: Rough value of known constant found

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类实现 Cloneable, 但未定义或使用克隆方法
checkrule_set.description: Class implements Cloneable but does not define or use clone method

checkrule_set.rule_title: clone 方法不会调用 super.clone()
checkrule_set.description: clone method does not call super.clone()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类定义了 clone() 但未实现 Cloneable
checkrule_set.description: Class defines clone() but doesn’t implement Cloneable

checkrule_set.rule_title: 抽象类定义协变 compareTo() 方法
checkrule_set.description: Abstract class defines covariant compareTo() method

checkrule_set.rule_title: compareTo()/compare() 错误地处理 float 或 double 值
checkrule_set.description: compareTo()/compare() incorrectly handles float or double value

checkrule_set.rule_title: compareTo()/compare() 返回 Integer.MIN_VALUE
checkrule_set.description: compareTo()/compare() returns Integer.MIN_VALUE

checkrule_set.rule_title: 定义协变 compareTo() 方法
checkrule_set.description: Covariant compareTo() method defined

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法对两个分支使用相同的代码
checkrule_set.description: Method uses the same code for two branches

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法对两个 switch 子句使用相同的代码
checkrule_set.description: Method uses the same code for two switch clauses

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可能再次检查字段
checkrule_set.description: Possible double check of field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可能暴露部分初始化的对象
checkrule_set.description: Possible exposure of partially initialized object

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法可能会丢弃异常
checkrule_set.description: Method might drop exception

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法可能会忽略异常
checkrule_set.description: Method might ignore exception

checkrule_set.rule_title: return 语句中无用的增量
checkrule_set.description: Useless increment in return statement

checkrule_set.rule_title: 死存储到局部变量
checkrule_set.description: Dead store to local variable

checkrule_set.rule_title: 返回语句中的无用赋值
checkrule_set.description: Useless assignment in return statement

checkrule_set.rule_title: 空存储到局部变量的空值
checkrule_set.description: Dead store of null to local variable

checkrule_set.rule_title: 死存储到阴影字段的局部变量
checkrule_set.description: Dead store to local variable that shadows field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类文字的死存储
checkrule_set.description: Dead store of class literal

checkrule_set.rule_title: 覆盖增量
checkrule_set.description: Overwritten increment

checkrule_set.rule_title: 布尔同步
checkrule_set.description: Synchronization on Boolean

checkrule_set.rule_title: 盒装原语上的同步
checkrule_set.description: Synchronization on boxed primitive

checkrule_set.rule_title: 内联字符串的同步
checkrule_set.description: Synchronization on interned String

checkrule_set.rule_title: 装箱原始值的同步
checkrule_set.description: Synchronization on boxed primitive values

checkrule_set.rule_title: 没有运行时保留，不能使用反射来检查注释的存在
checkrule_set.description: Can’t use reflection to check for presence of annotation without runtime retention

checkrule_set.rule_title: 反向方法参数
checkrule_set.description: Reversed method arguments

checkrule_set.rule_title: 月份的常数值错误
checkrule_set.description: Bad constant value for month

checkrule_set.rule_title: 由不精确表示的 double 构造的 BigDecimal
checkrule_set.description: BigDecimal constructed from double that isn’t represented precisely

checkrule_set.rule_title: URL 的 equals 和 hashCode 方法被阻止
checkrule_set.description: The equals and hashCode methods of URL are blocking

checkrule_set.rule_title: hasNext 方法调用 next
checkrule_set.description: hasNext method invokes next

checkrule_set.rule_title: 集合不应包含自身
checkrule_set.description: Collections should not contain themselves

checkrule_set.rule_title: 网址映射和网址集可能会降低性能
checkrule_set.description: Maps and sets of URLs can be performance hogs

checkrule_set.rule_title: 硬编码的常量数据库密码
checkrule_set.description: Hardcoded constant database password

checkrule_set.rule_title: 噢 ! 荒谬的方法调用
checkrule_set.description: D’oh! A nonsensical method invocation

checkrule_set.rule_title: 空数据库密码
checkrule_set.description: Empty database password

checkrule_set.rule_title: 由于重复使用 Entry 对象，可能无法添加条目集的元素
checkrule_set.description: Adding elements of an entry set may fail due to reuse of Entry objects

checkrule_set.rule_title: 更改 ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor 的最大池大小的徒劳尝试
checkrule_set.description: Futile attempt to change max pool size of ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor

checkrule_set.rule_title: 代码包含对绝对路径名的硬编码引用
checkrule_set.description: Code contains a hard coded reference to an absolute pathname

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在数组上调用 hashCode
checkrule_set.description: Invocation of hashCode on an array

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在未命名数组上调用 toString
checkrule_set.description: Invocation of toString on an unnamed array

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在数组上调用 toString
checkrule_set.description: Invocation of toString on an array

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在 int 上调用 Double.longBitsToDouble
checkrule_set.description: Double.longBitsToDouble invoked on an int

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不可序列化的对象写入 ObjectOutput
checkrule_set.description: Non serializable object written to ObjectOutput

checkrule_set.rule_title: 随机对象仅创建和使用一次
checkrule_set.description: Random object created and used only once

checkrule_set.rule_title: 使用零核心线程创建 ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor
checkrule_set.description: Creation of ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor with zero core threads

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在 Runnable 预期的地方传递了线程
checkrule_set.description: Thread passed where Runnable expected

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用不支持的方法
checkrule_set.description: Call to unsupported method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用 substring(0), 它返回原始值
checkrule_set.description: Invocation of substring(0), which returns the original value

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不要使用 removeAll 清除集合
checkrule_set.description: Don’t use removeAll to clear a collection

checkrule_set.rule_title: 对 EasyMock 方法的无用/空虚调用
checkrule_set.description: Useless/vacuous call to EasyMock method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 随意致电收藏
checkrule_set.description: Vacuous call to collections

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用低效的布尔构造函数 ; 使用 Boolean.valueOf(...) 代替
checkrule_set.description: Method invokes inefficient Boolean constructor; use Boolean.valueOf(…) instead

checkrule_set.rule_title: 装箱要比较的图元
checkrule_set.description: Boxing a primitive to compare

checkrule_set.rule_title: 装箱 / 拆箱以解析原语
checkrule_set.description: Boxing/unboxing to parse a primitive

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法分配一个盒装原语只是为了调用 toString
checkrule_set.description: Method allocates a boxed primitive just to call toString

checkrule_set.rule_title: 考虑使用被调用方法的 Locale 参数化版本
checkrule_set.description: Consider using Locale parameterized version of invoked method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 依赖默认编码
checkrule_set.description: Reliance on default encoding

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用 System.exit(…)
checkrule_set.description: Method invokes System.exit(…)

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用效率低下的浮点数构造函数 ; 使用静态 valueOf 代替
checkrule_set.description: Method invokes inefficient floating-point Number constructor; use static valueOf instead

checkrule_set.rule_title: 显式垃圾收集 ; 除了基准测试代码外，都非常可疑
checkrule_set.description: Explicit garbage collection; extremely dubious except in benchmarking code

checkrule_set.rule_title: Math.max 和 Math.min 的错误组合
checkrule_set.description: Incorrect combination of Math.max and Math.min

checkrule_set.rule_title: 监视条件调用的 wait()
checkrule_set.description: Monitor wait() called on Condition

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法分配一个对象，仅获取类对象
checkrule_set.description: Method allocates an object, only to get the class object

checkrule_set.rule_title: 使用 Random 的 nextInt 方法而不是 nextDouble 来生成随机整数
checkrule_set.description: Use the nextInt method of Random rather than nextDouble to generate a random integer

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用效率低下的 Number 构造函数 ; 使用静态 valueOf 代替
checkrule_set.description: Method invokes inefficient Number constructor; use static valueOf instead

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用危险的方法 runFinalizersOnExit
checkrule_set.description: Method invokes dangerous method runFinalizersOnExit

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用效率低的新 String(String) 构造函数
checkrule_set.description: Method invokes inefficient new String(String) constructor

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法在字符串上调用 toString() 方法
checkrule_set.description: Method invokes toString() method on a String

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用效率低的 new String() 构造函数
checkrule_set.description: Method invokes inefficient new String() constructor

checkrule_set.rule_title: 使用默认的空运行方法创建了一个线程
checkrule_set.description: A thread was created using the default empty run method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类加载器只能在 doPrivileged 块内创建
checkrule_set.description: Classloaders should only be created inside doPrivileged block

checkrule_set.rule_title: 只能在 doPrivileged 块内调用的方法已调用
checkrule_set.description: Method invoked that should be only be invoked inside a doPrivileged block

checkrule_set.rule_title: equals() 用于比较数组和非数组
checkrule_set.description: equals() used to compare array and nonarray

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在数组上调用 equals(), 它等效于 ==
checkrule_set.description: Invocation of equals() on an array, which is equivalent to ==

checkrule_set.rule_title: equals(…) 用于比较不兼容的数组
checkrule_set.description: equals(…) used to compare incompatible arrays

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用等于 ( 空 )
checkrule_set.description: Call to equals(null)

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用 equals() 比较不相关的类和接口
checkrule_set.description: Call to equals() comparing unrelated class and interface

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用 equals() 比较不同的接口类型
checkrule_set.description: Call to equals() comparing different interface types

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用 equals() 比较不同类型
checkrule_set.description: Call to equals() comparing different types

checkrule_set.rule_title: 使用指针相等来比较不同类型
checkrule_set.description: Using pointer equality to compare different types

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可以通过返回对可变对象的引用来公开内部表示
checkrule_set.description: May expose internal representation by returning reference to mutable object

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可能通过合并对可变对象的引用来公开内部表示
checkrule_set.description: May expose internal representation by incorporating reference to mutable object

checkrule_set.rule_title: 通过将可变对象存储到静态字段中可以暴露内部静态状态
checkrule_set.description: May expose internal static state by storing a mutable object into a static field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 抽象类定义协变 equals() 方法
checkrule_set.description: Abstract class defines covariant equals() method

checkrule_set.rule_title: equals 方法始终返回 false
checkrule_set.description: equals method always returns false

checkrule_set.rule_title: equals 方法始终返回 true
checkrule_set.description: equals method always returns true

checkrule_set.rule_title: 等于检查不兼容的操作数
checkrule_set.description: Equals checks for incompatible operand

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类定义 compareTo(…) 并使用 Object.equals()
checkrule_set.description: Class defines compareTo(…) and uses Object.equals()

checkrule_set.rule_title: equals 方法比较类名而不是类对象
checkrule_set.description: equals method compares class names rather than class objects

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类不会覆盖超类中的等于
checkrule_set.description: Class doesn’t override equals in superclass

checkrule_set.rule_title: 为枚举定义的协变 equals() 方法
checkrule_set.description: Covariant equals() method defined for enum

checkrule_set.rule_title: 子类型的 equals 方法失败
checkrule_set.description: equals method fails for subtypes

checkrule_set.rule_title: 定义的 equals() 方法不会覆盖 equals(Object)
checkrule_set.description: equals() method defined that doesn’t override equals(Object)

checkrule_set.rule_title: 定义的 equals() 方法不会覆盖 Object.equals(Object)
checkrule_set.description: equals() method defined that doesn’t override Object.equals(Object)

checkrule_set.rule_title: equals 方法将覆盖超类中的 equals, 并且可能不是对称的
checkrule_set.description: equals method overrides equals in superclass and may not be symmetric

checkrule_set.rule_title: 定义协方差 equals() 方法
checkrule_set.description: Covariant equals() method defined

checkrule_set.rule_title: 定义了协变 equals() 方法，继承了 Object.equals(Object)
checkrule_set.description: Covariant equals() method defined, Object.equals(Object) inherited

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不寻常的相等方法
checkrule_set.description: Unusual equals method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 空同步块
checkrule_set.description: Empty synchronized block

checkrule_set.rule_title: 使用 == 或 != 比较 String 参数
checkrule_set.description: Comparison of String parameter using == or !=

checkrule_set.rule_title: 使用 == 或 != 比较 String 对象
checkrule_set.description: Comparison of String objects using == or !=

checkrule_set.rule_title: 缺少 SpotBugs 的预期或期望的警告
checkrule_set.description: Missing expected or desired warning from SpotBugs

checkrule_set.rule_title: 来自 SpotBugs 的意外 / 意外警告
checkrule_set.description: Unexpected/undesired warning from SpotBugs

checkrule_set.rule_title: 测试浮点相等
checkrule_set.description: Test for floating point equality

checkrule_set.rule_title: 注定要与 NaN 相等的测试
checkrule_set.description: Doomed test for equality to NaN

checkrule_set.rule_title: 空的终结器应删除
checkrule_set.description: Empty finalizer should be deleted

checkrule_set.rule_title: 显式调用终结器
checkrule_set.description: Explicit invocation of finalizer

checkrule_set.rule_title: 终结器为空字段
checkrule_set.description: Finalizer nulls fields

checkrule_set.rule_title: 终结器仅使字段为空
checkrule_set.description: Finalizer only nulls fields

checkrule_set.rule_title: 终结器不会调用超类终结器
checkrule_set.description: Finalizer does not call superclass finalizer

checkrule_set.rule_title: 终结器使超类终结器失效
checkrule_set.description: Finalizer nullifies superclass finalizer

checkrule_set.rule_title: 终结器应该受到保护，而不是公开的
checkrule_set.description: Finalizer should be protected, not public

checkrule_set.rule_title: 终结器什么也不做，只能调用超类终结器
checkrule_set.description: Finalizer does nothing but call superclass finalizer

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法使用浮点精度执行数学运算
checkrule_set.description: Method performs math using floating point precision

checkrule_set.rule_title: 通用通话中未经检查的类型
checkrule_set.description: Unchecked type in generic call

checkrule_set.rule_title: 泛型参数和方法参数之间没有关系
checkrule_set.description: No relationship between generic parameter and method argument

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类定义 equals() 但未定义 hashCode()
checkrule_set.description: Class defines equals() but not hashCode()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类定义 equals() 并使用 Object.hashCode()
checkrule_set.description: Class defines equals() and uses Object.hashCode()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类定义 hashCode() 但不等于 equals()
checkrule_set.description: Class defines hashCode() but not equals()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类定义 hashCode() 并使用 Object.equals()
checkrule_set.description: Class defines hashCode() and uses Object.equals()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类继承 equals() 并使用 Object.hashCode()
checkrule_set.description: Class inherits equals() and uses Object.hashCode()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 签名声明在散列结构中使用不可散列的类
checkrule_set.description: Signature declares use of unhashable class in hashed construct

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在哈希数据结构中使用没有 hashCode() 方法的类
checkrule_set.description: Use of class without a hashCode() method in a hashed data structure

checkrule_set.rule_title: 由不受信任的输入形成的 HTTP cookie
checkrule_set.description: HTTP cookie formed from untrusted input

checkrule_set.rule_title: HTTP 响应拆分漏洞
checkrule_set.description: HTTP Response splitting vulnerability

checkrule_set.rule_title: 巨大的字符串常量在多个类文件中重复
checkrule_set.description: Huge string constants is duplicated across multiple class files

checkrule_set.rule_title: 继承或外部方法的潜在歧义调用
checkrule_set.description: Potentially ambiguous invocation of either an inherited or outer method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 32 位 int 移位的量不在 -31..31 范围内
checkrule_set.description: 32 bit int shifted by an amount not in the range -31..31

checkrule_set.rule_title: 积分除法结果转换为 double 或 float
checkrule_set.description: Integral division result cast to double or float

checkrule_set.rule_title: 整数乘法的结果强制转换为 long
checkrule_set.description: Result of integer multiplication cast to long

checkrule_set.rule_title: 将 int 值转换为 long 并用作绝对时间
checkrule_set.description: int value converted to long and used as absolute time

checkrule_set.rule_title: 积分值强制转换为两倍，然后传递给 Math.ceil
checkrule_set.description: Integral value cast to double and then passed to Math.ceil

checkrule_set.rule_title: 将 int 值强制转换为 float, 然后传递给 Math.round
checkrule_set.description: int value cast to float and then passed to Math.round

checkrule_set.rule_title: 无符号右移强制转换为 short/byte
checkrule_set.description: Unsigned right shift cast to short/byte

checkrule_set.rule_title: 初始化圆度
checkrule_set.description: Initialization circularity

checkrule_set.rule_title: 超类在初始化期间使用子类
checkrule_set.description: Superclass uses subclass during initialization

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在循环中调用 NodeList.getLength()
checkrule_set.description: NodeList.getLength() called in a loop

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法在循环中调用 Pattern.compile
checkrule_set.description: Method calls Pattern.compile in a loop

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法在循环中编译正则表达式
checkrule_set.description: Method compiles the regular expression in a loop

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法在循环中调用 prepareStatement
checkrule_set.description: Method calls prepareStatement in a loop

checkrule_set.rule_title: 无效使用 String.indexOf(String)
checkrule_set.description: Inefficient use of String.indexOf(String)

checkrule_set.rule_title: 无效使用 String.lastIndexOf(String)
checkrule_set.description: Inefficient use of String.lastIndexOf(String)

checkrule_set.rule_title: JUnit 不会注意到 run 方法中的 JUnit 断言

checkrule_set.description: Vacuous comparison of integer value

checkrule_set.description: Needless instantiation of class that only supplies static methods

checkrule_set.description: Field not guarded against concurrent access

checkrule_set.description: Iterator next() method can’t throw NoSuchElementException

checkrule_set.description: Fields of immutable classes should be final

checkrule_set.description: Mismatched wait()

checkrule_set.description: Class names should start with an upper case letter

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法名称混乱
checkrule_set.description: Confusing method names

checkrule_set.rule_title: 字段名称应以小写字母开头
checkrule_set.description: Field names should start with a lower case letter

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类定义 hashcode(); 应该是 hashCode() 吗 ?
checkrule_set.description: Class defines hashcode(); should it be hashCode()?

checkrule_set.rule_title: 明显的方法/构造函数混淆
checkrule_set.description: Apparent method/constructor confusion

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法名称应以小写字母开头
checkrule_set.description: Method names should start with a lower case letter

checkrule_set.rule_title: 非常混乱的方法名称
checkrule_set.description: Very confusing method names

checkrule_set.description: Very confusing method names (but perhaps intentional)

checkrule_set.rule_title: 由于参数包错误，方法无法覆盖超类中的方法

checkrule_set.rule_title: 裸通知
checkrule_set.description: Naked notify

checkrule_set.rule_title: 有关字段参考的虚假警告
checkrule_set.description: Bogus warning about a field reference

checkrule_set.description: Bogus warning about a null pointer dereference

checkrule_set.description: Bogus warning about an operation

checkrule_set.rule_title: 使用 notify() 而不是 notifyAll()
checkrule_set.description: Using notify() rather than notifyAll()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 空指针取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Null pointer dereference

checkrule_set.rule_title: 异常路径上的方法中的空指针取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Null pointer dereference in method on exception path

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法不检查空参数
checkrule_set.description: Method does not check for null argument

checkrule_set.rule_title: 布尔返回类型的方法返回显式 null
checkrule_set.description: Method with Boolean return type returns explicit null

checkrule_set.rule_title: 克隆方法可能返回 null
checkrule_set.description: Clone method may return null

checkrule_set.rule_title: 对始终为 null 的值调用 close()
checkrule_set.description: close() invoked on a value that is always null

checkrule_set.rule_title: 取消引用 readLine() 的结果而不使用 nullcheck
checkrule_set.description: Dereference of the result of readLine() without nullcheck

checkrule_set.rule_title: equals() 方法不检查空参数
checkrule_set.description: equals() method does not check for null argument

checkrule_set.rule_title: 空值保证被取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Null value is guaranteed to be dereferenced

checkrule_set.rule_title: 值是 null, 并保证在异常路径上被取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Value is null and guaranteed to be dereferenced on exception path

checkrule_set.rule_title: 立即取消对 readLine() 结果的引用
checkrule_set.description: Immediate dereference of the result of readLine()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 加载已知空值
checkrule_set.description: Load of known null value

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法加强参数的空注
checkrule_set.description: Method tightens nullness annotation on parameter

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法放宽对返回值的空注释
checkrule_set.description: Method relaxes nullness annotation on return value

checkrule_set.rule_title: 非空字段未初始化
checkrule_set.description: Non-null field is not initialized

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用将 null 传递给非 null 参数
checkrule_set.description: Method call passes null to a non-null parameter

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法可能返回 null, 但是被声明为 @Nonnull
checkrule_set.description: Method may return null, but is declared @Nonnull

checkrule_set.rule_title: 检查一个已知的空值，看它是否是一个类型的实例
checkrule_set.description: A known null value is checked to see if it is an instance of a type

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可能的空指针取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Possible null pointer dereference

checkrule_set.rule_title: 异常路径上方法中可能的空指针取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Possible null pointer dereference in method on exception path

checkrule_set.rule_title: 由于调用方法的返回值，可能导致空指针取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Possible null pointer dereference due to return value of called method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可能无法在分支上进行空指针取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Possible null pointer dereference on branch that might be infeasible

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用为非 null 参数传递 null
checkrule_set.description: Method call passes null for non-null parameter

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用为非 null 参数传递 null
checkrule_set.description: Method call passes null for non-null parameter

checkrule_set.rule_title: 非虚拟方法调用为非 null 参数传递 null
checkrule_set.description: Non-virtual method call passes null for non-null parameter

checkrule_set.rule_title: 具有可选返回类型的方法返回显式 null
checkrule_set.description: Method with Optional return type returns explicit null

checkrule_set.rule_title: 参数必须为非 null, 但标记为可为空
checkrule_set.description: Parameter must be non-null but is marked as nullable

checkrule_set.rule_title: 将空值存储到带注释的 @Nonnull 的字段中
checkrule_set.description: Store of null value into field annotated @Nonnull

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在同一字段上进行同步和空检查。
checkrule_set.description: Synchronize and null check on the same field.

checkrule_set.rule_title: toString 方法可能返回 null
checkrule_set.description: toString method may return null

checkrule_set.rule_title: 读取未写字段
checkrule_set.description: Read of unwritten field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 读取未成文的公共或受保护的字段
checkrule_set.description: Read of unwritten public or protected field

checkrule_set.description: Potentially dangerous use of non-short-circuit logic

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可疑使用非短路逻辑
checkrule_set.description: Questionable use of non-short-circuit logic

checkrule_set.description: Method may fail to clean up stream or resource

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法可能无法根据检查的异常清理流或资源

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法可能无法关闭流

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法可能无法在异常时关闭流
checkrule_set.description: Method may fail to close stream on exception

checkrule_set.rule_title: 超级方法带有 @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper 注释，但替代方法未调用超级方法。

checkrule_set.description: Class exposes synchronization and semaphores in its public interface

checkrule_set.rule_title: servlet 中的绝对路径遍历
checkrule_set.description: Absolute path traversal in servlet

checkrule_set.rule_title: servlet 中的相对路径遍历
checkrule_set.description: Relative path traversal in servlet

checkrule_set.rule_title: 考虑返回零长度数组而不是 null
checkrule_set.description: Consider returning a zero length array rather than null

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不要在迭代器中重复使用入口对象
checkrule_set.description: Don’t reuse entry objects in iterators

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法在布尔表达式中分配布尔文字
checkrule_set.description: Method assigns boolean literal in boolean expression

checkrule_set.rule_title: for 循环中的复杂，微妙或错误的增量
checkrule_set.description: Complicated, subtle or wrong increment in for-loop

checkrule_set.description: Redundant comparison of non-null value to null

checkrule_set.rule_title: 两个空值的冗余比较
checkrule_set.description: Redundant comparison of two null values

checkrule_set.description: Redundant nullcheck of value known to be non-null

checkrule_set.description: Redundant nullcheck of value known to be null

checkrule_set.description: Nullcheck of value previously dereferenced

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可疑参考比较

checkrule_set.description: Suspicious reference comparison to constant

checkrule_set.rule_title: 布尔值的可疑参考比较
checkrule_set.description: Suspicious reference comparison of Boolean values

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未抛出异常时捕获异常
checkrule_set.description: Exception is caught when Exception is not thrown

checkrule_set.rule_title: 正则表达式的语法无效

checkrule_set.description: File.separator used for regular expression

checkrule_set.description: Class implements same interface as superclass

checkrule_set.rule_title: 重复条件测试
checkrule_set.description: Repeated conditional tests

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类的 readObject() 方法已同步
checkrule_set.description: Class’s readObject() method is synchronized

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用在线程上运行 ( 您是要启动它吗 ?)
checkrule_set.description: Invokes run on a thread (did you mean to start it instead?)

checkrule_set.rule_title: 从 0 到 1 的随机值被强制为整数 0

checkrule_set.description: Nonsensical self computation involving a variable (e.g., x & x)

checkrule_set.description: Non-serializable class has a serializable inner class

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不可序列化的值存储在可序列化类的实例字段中
checkrule_set.description: Non-serializable value stored into instance field of a serializable class

checkrule_set.rule_title: 比较器未实现可序列化
checkrule_set.description: Comparator doesn’t implement Serializable

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可序列化的内部类
checkrule_set.description: Serializable inner class

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法必须是私有的，序列化才能起作用
checkrule_set.description: Method must be private in order for serialization to work

checkrule_set.rule_title: serialVersionUID 不是最终的
checkrule_set.description: serialVersionUID isn’t final

checkrule_set.rule_title: serialVersionUID 不长
checkrule_set.description: serialVersionUID isn’t long

checkrule_set.rule_title: serialVersionUID 不是静态的
checkrule_set.description: serialVersionUID isn’t static

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类是可序列化的，但未定义 serialVersionUID
checkrule_set.description: Class is Serializable, but doesn’t define serialVersionUID

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类是可序列化的，但是其超类未定义 void 构造函数
checkrule_set.description: Class is Serializable but its superclass doesn’t define a void constructor

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类是可外部化的，但未定义 void 构造函数
checkrule_set.description: Class is Externalizable but doesn’t define a void constructor

checkrule_set.rule_title: 私有 readResolve 方法不被子类继承
checkrule_set.description: Private readResolve method not inherited by subclasses

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不能将 readResolve 方法声明为静态方法。
checkrule_set.description: The readResolve method must not be declared as a static method.

checkrule_set.rule_title: 必须使用 Object 的返回类型声明 readResolve 方法。
checkrule_set.description: The readResolve method must be declared with a return type of Object.

checkrule_set.rule_title: 并非由反序列化设置的瞬态字段。
checkrule_set.description: Transient field that isn’t set by deserialization.

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不可序列化的类的瞬态字段。
checkrule_set.description: Transient field of class that isn’t Serializable.

checkrule_set.rule_title: 由于 switch 语句失效而导致的死存储
checkrule_set.description: Dead store due to switch statement fall through

checkrule_set.rule_title: 死存储由于 switch 语句掉落而抛出
checkrule_set.description: Dead store due to switch statement fall through to throw

checkrule_set.rule_title: Switch 语句找到了一个案例进入下一个案例的地方
checkrule_set.description: Switch statement found where one case falls through to the next case

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在缺少默认情况的地方找到了 switch 语句
checkrule_set.description: Switch statement found where default case is missing

checkrule_set.rule_title: 应该是静态内部类
checkrule_set.description: Should be a static inner class

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可以重构为命名的静态内部类
checkrule_set.description: Could be refactored into a named static inner class

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可以重构为静态内部类
checkrule_set.description: Could be refactored into a static inner class

checkrule_set.rule_title: 致命拥抱非静态内部类和线程本地
checkrule_set.description: Deadly embrace of non-static inner class and thread local

checkrule_set.rule_title: 使用 instanceof 运算符进行不必要的类型检查
checkrule_set.description: Unnecessary type check done using instanceof operator

checkrule_set.rule_title: 静态初始化程序在分配所有静态最终字段之前创建实例
checkrule_set.description: Static initializer creates instance before all static final fields assigned

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类别太大，无法分析
checkrule_set.description: Class too big for analysis

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法在现场旋转
checkrule_set.description: Method spins on field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法尝试访问索引为 0 的准备好的语句参数
checkrule_set.description: Method attempts to access a prepared statement parameter with index 0

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法尝试访问索引为 0 的结果集字段
checkrule_set.description: Method attempts to access a result set field with index 0

checkrule_set.rule_title: 传递给 SQL 语句中的 execute 或 addBatch 方法的非恒定字符串
checkrule_set.description: Nonconstant string passed to execute or addBatch method on an SQL statement

checkrule_set.rule_title: 从非恒定字符串生成准备好的语句
checkrule_set.description: A prepared statement is generated from a nonconstant String

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法将忽略 InputStream.skip() 的结果
checkrule_set.description: Method ignores results of InputStream.skip()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未读字段 : 此字段应为静态吗 ?
checkrule_set.description: Unread field: should this field be static?

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用静态日历
checkrule_set.description: Call to static Calendar

checkrule_set.rule_title: 调用静态 DateFormat
checkrule_set.description: Call to static DateFormat

checkrule_set.rule_title: 静态日历字段
checkrule_set.description: Static Calendar field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 静态 DateFormat
checkrule_set.description: Static DateFormat

checkrule_set.rule_title: 不需要使用 currentThread() 调用来调用 interrupted()
checkrule_set.description: Unneeded use of currentThread() call, to call interrupted()

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在线程实例上调用静态 Thread.interrupted() 方法
checkrule_set.description: Static Thread.interrupted() method invoked on thread instance

checkrule_set.rule_title: 从实例方法写入静态字段
checkrule_set.description: Write to static field from instance method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法调用 Thread.sleep() 并保持锁定
checkrule_set.description: Method calls Thread.sleep() with a lock held

checkrule_set.rule_title: 需要在 Swing 线程中调用某些 swing 方法
checkrule_set.description: Certain swing methods needs to be invoked in Swing thread

checkrule_set.rule_title: 测试中
checkrule_set.description: Testing

checkrule_set.rule_title: 测试 1
checkrule_set.description: Testing 1

checkrule_set.rule_title: 测试 2
checkrule_set.description: Testing 2

checkrule_set.rule_title: 测试 3
checkrule_set.description: Testing 3

checkrule_set.rule_title: 等待两把锁
checkrule_set.description: Wait with two locks held

checkrule_set.rule_title: 注释为带有类型限定符的值，该值必须用于不能包含该限定符的值
checkrule_set.description: Value annotated as carrying a type qualifier used where a value that must not carry that qualifier is required

checkrule_set.rule_title: 将值与不兼容的类型限定符进行比较
checkrule_set.description: Comparing values with incompatible type qualifiers

checkrule_set.rule_title: 必须具有类型限定符的值，但标记为未知
checkrule_set.description: Value required to have type qualifier, but marked as unknown

checkrule_set.rule_title: 值必须没有类型限定符，但标记为未知
checkrule_set.description: Value required to not have type qualifier, but marked as unknown

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可能不带有类型限定符的值始终以要求该类型限定符的方式使用
checkrule_set.description: Value that might not carry a type qualifier is always used in a way requires that type qualifier

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可能带有类型限定符的值始终以一种禁止其具有该类型限定符的方式使用
checkrule_set.description: Value that might carry a type qualifier is always used in a way prohibits it from having that type qualifier

checkrule_set.rule_title: 注释为从不携带类型限定符的值，该值必须用于携带该限定符的值
checkrule_set.description: Value annotated as never carrying a type qualifier used where value carrying that qualifier is required

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在没有值限定符的情况下使用的值需要具有该限定符的值
checkrule_set.description: Value without a type qualifier used where a value is required to have that qualifier

checkrule_set.rule_title: 无用的控制流程
checkrule_set.description: Useless control flow

checkrule_set.rule_title: 对下一行无用的控制流
checkrule_set.description: Useless control flow to next line

checkrule_set.rule_title: 条件无效
checkrule_set.description: Condition has no effect

checkrule_set.rule_title: 由于变量类型，条件无效
checkrule_set.description: Condition has no effect due to the variable type

checkrule_set.rule_title: 创建了无用的对象
checkrule_set.description: Useless object created

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在堆栈上创建无用的对象
checkrule_set.description: Useless object created on stack

checkrule_set.rule_title: 无用的非空无效方法
checkrule_set.description: Useless non-empty void method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 非同步的 get 方法，同步的 set 方法
checkrule_set.description: Unsynchronized get method, synchronized set method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 如果扩展了类，则使用 GetResource 可能是不安全的
checkrule_set.description: Usage of GetResource may be unsafe if class is extended

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法不会在所有路径上释放锁定
checkrule_set.description: Method does not release lock on all paths

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法不会在所有异常路径上释放锁定
checkrule_set.description: Method does not release lock on all exception paths

checkrule_set.rule_title: 匿名类中定义的不可调用方法
checkrule_set.description: Uncallable method defined in anonymous class

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法在常量值上调用静态 Math 类方法
checkrule_set.description: Method calls static Math class method on a constant value

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未知的错误模式
checkrule_set.description: Unknown bug pattern

checkrule_set.rule_title: 永远不会调用私有方法
checkrule_set.description: Private method is never called

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未读字段
checkrule_set.description: Unread field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未读的公共 / 受保护字段
checkrule_set.description: Unread public/protected field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在构造函数中未初始化的字段读取
checkrule_set.description: Uninitialized read of field in constructor

checkrule_set.rule_title: 从超类的构造函数调用的未初始化的字段方法读取
checkrule_set.description: Uninitialized read of field method called from constructor of superclass

checkrule_set.rule_title: 抽象方法已在实现的接口中定义
checkrule_set.description: Abstract Method is already defined in implemented interface

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法多余地委托给父类方法
checkrule_set.description: Method superfluously delegates to parent class method

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未使用的字段
checkrule_set.description: Unused field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未使用的公共或保护区
checkrule_set.description: Unused public or protected field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 字段未在构造函数中初始化，但在未进行空检查的情况下被取消引用
checkrule_set.description: Field not initialized in constructor but dereferenced without null check

checkrule_set.rule_title: 仅将字段设置为 null
checkrule_set.description: Field only ever set to null

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未写字段
checkrule_set.description: Unwritten field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 未写入的公共或受保护字段
checkrule_set.description: Unwritten public or protected field

checkrule_set.rule_title: 无条件等待
checkrule_set.description: Unconditional wait

checkrule_set.rule_title: 格式字符串应使用 %n 而不是 n
checkrule_set.description: Format string should use %n rather than n

checkrule_set.rule_title: 传递给函数的原始数组期望对象参数的数量可变
checkrule_set.description: Primitive array passed to function expecting a variable number of object arguments

checkrule_set.rule_title: 可变字段的增量不是原子的
checkrule_set.description: An increment to a volatile field isn’t atomic

checkrule_set.rule_title: 对数组的易失性引用不会将数组元素视为易失性
checkrule_set.description: A volatile reference to an array doesn’t treat the array elements as volatile

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类引用了无法解析的类或方法
checkrule_set.description: Class makes reference to unresolvable class or method

checkrule_set.rule_title: Condition.await() 未循环
checkrule_set.description: Condition.await() not in loop

checkrule_set.rule_title: 等待不循环
checkrule_set.description: Wait not in loop

checkrule_set.rule_title: 在 getClass 同步，而不是类文字
checkrule_set.description: Synchronization on getClass rather than class literal

checkrule_set.rule_title: 无效使用 keySet 迭代器，而不是 entrySet 迭代器
checkrule_set.description: Inefficient use of keySet iterator instead of entrySet iterator

checkrule_set.rule_title: 类的 writeObject() 方法已同步，但除此之外没有其他
checkrule_set.description: Class’s writeObject() method is synchronized but nothing else is

checkrule_set.rule_title: 方法直接分配 xml 接口的特定实现
checkrule_set.description: Method directly allocates a specific implementation of xml interfaces

checkrule_set.rule_title: JSP 反映了跨站点脚本漏洞
checkrule_set.description: JSP reflected cross site scripting vulnerability

checkrule_set.rule_title: Servlet 在错误页面中反映了跨站点脚本漏洞
checkrule_set.description: Servlet reflected cross site scripting vulnerability in error page

checkrule_set.rule_title: Servlet 反映了跨站点脚本漏洞
checkrule_set.description: Servlet reflected cross site scripting vulnerability
